EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our webinar, Optimize Agile Testing with Tricentis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Optimize Agile Testing with Tricentis
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Thanks for taking the time to attend our webinar, “Optimize Agile Testing with Tricentis.” We hope you enjoyed it as much as we did. Your participation and engaging questions made all the difference.
If you’re interested in seeing this and other webinars, visit www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>.
Best Wishes,
The Tricentis Team
Michael Niessl Sales Support at Tricentis
Joshua Davis Tricentis Marketing
